text: Kit Harington and Rose Leslie got engaged in September 2017. Frederick M. Brown / Getty Images Kit Harington and Rose Leslie are living the fairy tale ending their ` ` Game of Thrones'' characters never got to see. After dating for several years, the happy couple is now engaged to be married. Unfortunately for ` ` Game of Thrones'' fans hoping to hear a romantic proposal story, Harington flubbed a key turn of phrase when he told the tale to Jonathan Ross during a taping for his upcoming October 7 episode. As reported by The Sun, Harington said the proposal didn't go as he'd planned. ` ` I was going to string up some lights in some trees and do all the romantic stuff but we were in the country and we were under this
